spec_data.Name: salt-ssh
spec_data.Description:
The salt-ssh tool can run remote execution functions and states without the use
of an agent (salt-minion) service.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 15 Aug 2017 01:45:23 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Agentless SSH-based version of Salt, a parallel remote execution system
